short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: usage: type 'go' into the search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
****
Shortcut Manager DELUXE is the former version of "Hive Bookmarks", and its tech support will disabled soon.

* We warmly encourage SMD users to migrate to our new "Hive" extension (migration guide is provided inside the extension popup note").

* New users can search for "Hive bookmarks" and use it. Hive contains every single feature of SMD. It's bug-free and has a clean and user-friendly interface.

Thank you!
****

What's SMD? 

Navigate the web by typing!

Its easy as 1,2,3 ...

1. Define a short-name to your favorite websites.
2. Type go at the address bar, then the short-name of your desired website.
3. Hit ENTER! 
 
___

Features:
----------------------
REMOVE Alias feature.
Import and Export aliases feature.
Neater Design and Layout
